## AuthContainer.saveExtraSessionInfoOptions() method

Save extra session information.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
saveExtraSessionInfoOptions(): Promise<void>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<void>`

## Remarks

The SDK would populate extra session information from storage when calling [configure](./node-client.container.configure.md)<!-- -->.
